Hold Object¶

class reamber.base.HoldObj.HoldObj(offset: float = 0.0, column: int = 0, length: float = 0.0)¶

Bases: reamber.base.NoteObj.NoteObj

A holdable timed object with a specified length.

We only store the length, the tail offset is calculated.

__init__(offset: float = 0.0, column: int = 0, length: float = 0.0) → None¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

tailOffset() → float¶

Gets the offset for the tail

length: float = 0.0¶
